Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I bought KSP a few weeks ago after watching Scott Manley on YouTube for while. After about a week of fiddling with the tutorial and having many spectacular failures, I decided to lurk the forums. And honestly I wouldn't have been able to land on the Mun without the knowledge on this forum (and some of Scott's videos as well).

So I don't really have any questions ATM, I just wanted to join the forum world officially! 

Safe journeys everyone!
Welcome to our forum, SubwayManager.
